body.p: Oxygen Feedback supports facets and faceted search. Facets are predefined categories that are associated with search results. By selecting one or more facets, users can narrow down their search results to a specific category or set of categories. This topic describes the process of collecting facets and what should you do in order to use this feature on your websites.

section.title: How are facets collected?
section.p: Besides this a topic must have a generated meta tag which stores the topic's category, subcategory and value. It should have the next structure:<meta name="topic-facet" content="family/lamiaceae">
In this example the topic will have the family category and lamiaceae value.
Feedback search engine also supports hierarchical categories:<meta name="topic-facet" content="level/advanced/technician">
In this example the topic will have the level category, advanced subcategory and technician value.

section.title: How to add facets to your output?
section.p: To learn more about facets and how to add them to your website visit this topic: How to Configure Faceted Search in WebHelp Output
